name: Tilt Red Marble Game
description:
The game Red Marble is about a Red Marble that has to beat 12 levels and various different skills the player will have to learn to win.

Player earns score by picking up coins

The player resets the level in they fall off or into lava

The player wins if they hit the last checkpoint on level 12

The player can pause the game and choose to go to the Main Menu, Level 1, or to Quit the game

The Red Marble has to learn different skills to win the different types of level which vary in difficulty

Each set of levels are textured to represent the difficulty of the level

1-4 levels have white walls and blue floors

5-8 levels have green walls and green floors

9-11 levels have orange walls and orange floors

Level 12 is the hardest level and has black walls and floors

A small pink trail follows the player

The player can Dash and Jump

Jumping and picking up a coin makes a sound

Music is present throughout the levels and does not restart in-between levels but simply continues.

Towards the last levels different camera angles are introduced

UI for buttons and keeping score
